Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2002 affecting package libdwarf for versions less than 0.9.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2002 affecting package libdwarf for versions less than 0.9.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libdwarf is earlier than 0.9.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-2002
